abstract.para: File or folder copying may fail due to several reasons. Ensure that you have the required permissions and resources to perform the file copy.

topic.para: Possible troubleshooting methods are mentioned below:

listitem.para: Ensure that you have the latest version of rsync.
Ensure that you have the required rsync access permission.
Ensure that the specified hostname corresponds to the correct storage location (Example, vny, cpm, or ams). The rsync hostname assigned to your account is listed on the RSYNC page.
Ensure that the command used to transfer your content matches the syntax defined below.
Ensure that the {Local path} points to an existing folder on your system.
Ensure that {Destination Path} starts with a forward slash.
